name: @pipobscure/stack-trace
description: Extract and augment errors with detailed stack-traces

scripts.build:cjs: [ -f tsconfig.cjs.json ]  && [ -d src ] && tsc --project ./tsconfig.cjs.json && ls dist/*.js | xargs node rename.mjs cjs
scripts.build:esm: [ -f tsconfig.esm.json ]  && [ -d src ] && tsc --project ./tsconfig.esm.json && ls dist/*.js | xargs node rename.mjs mjs
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
